item.title: Recognise the Production Date of your Cisco Equipment based on the Serial
item.description: Today i learnt that the Production Year and Week is ‘hidden’ in the Cisco Serials ðŸ™‚ The format of the serial is always like ‘xxxYYWWxxxx’, ‘YY’ is Code for the Year, but not the Year itself! ‘WW’ is the week of manufacture. Code Year 01 1997 02 1998 03 1999 04 2000 05 2001 06 2002 07 2003 08 2004 09 2005 10 2006 11 2007 12 2008 13 2009 14 2010 15 2011 16 2012 17 2013 18 2014 19 2015 20 2016 Code Week 1-5 January 6-9 February 10-14 March 15-18 April 19-22 May 23-27 June 28-31 July 32-35 August 36-40 September 41-44 October 45-48 November 49-52 December
